Interface ClockPort

All Known Implementing Classes:
SystemClockAdapter
public interface ClockPort
Provides access to wall-clock time for timestamping reconstructed events.
Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ClockPort
    SYSTEM
    Default implementation backed by System.currentTimeMillis().

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    nowMillis()
    Returns the current epoch time in milliseconds.
